If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer A line that was originally set on making low-rise underwear for today's belly-baring, hip-hugging fashions, SOLOW has evolved into a collection of low-rise sportswear. SOLOW founder Sarah Siegel-Magness has had some luck with her creation from managing to sign with a wholesaler with only one sample product to amazing exposure when Hillary Duff donned a SOLOW skirt for the Lizzy McGuire Movie poster. Popular with celebs and girls across the country, the comfort of SOLOW is unparalleled. See all SOLOW reviews Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
